scripts.build:windows: npm run build && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:macos-arm: npm run build && npm run tauri build -- --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:macos-x64: npm run build && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && npm run tauri build -- --target universal-apple-darwin
